name: socnv

body.origin:
|- wi(wor(c0, c1), wor(ccnv(c0), c1))
-| wb(wor(c0, c1), wor(ccnv(c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wor(c0, c1), wor(ccnv(c0), c1))
-| wb(wor(c0, c1), wor(ccnv(c0), c1))

comment: The converse of a strict ordering is still a strict ordering. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Jun-2018.)
